entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 3:35 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.9°C

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.8°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
